<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Populate hash code package version</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var attachmentGR = new GlideRecord("sys_attachment");
attachmentGR.addQuery("table_name", "sn_rpa_fdn_package_version");
attachmentGR.orderBy("sys_created_on");
attachmentGR.query();

var packageVersionHashMap = {};
var packageVersionIdList = [];

while (attachmentGR.next()) {
    var packageVersObj = {};
    var tableSysId = attachmentGR.getValue("table_sys_id");

    // To pick the hash code of the first attachment of a package version
    if (packageVersionIdList.indexOf(tableSysId) == -1) {

        packageVersionIdList.push(tableSysId);
        packageVersionHashMap[tableSysId] = attachmentGR.getValue("hash");
    }
}

var packageVersionGR = new GlideRecord("sn_rpa_fdn_package_version");
packageVersionGR.setWorkflow(false);

//Exclude retired packages.
packageVersionGR.addEncodedQuery("package.life_cycle_stage_status!=b4e8ca55b7620010ee0d3177ee11a95a");
packageVersionGR.addQuery("sys_id", "IN", packageVersionIdList);
packageVersionGR.query();

while (packageVersionGR.next()) {

    var id = packageVersionGR.getUniqueValue();
    packageVersionGR.setValue("hash_code", packageVersionHashMap[id]);
    packageVersionGR.update();

}]]></script>
